commit.message:
tree-into-ssa.c (mark_block_for_update): Avoid redundant call of bitmap_bit_p.

	* tree-into-ssa.c (mark_block_for_update): Avoid redundant call
	of bitmap_bit_p.
	* cfganal.c (compute_dominance_frontiers_1): Likewise.
